sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A discourse of that which happened in the battell fought betweene the two navies of Spaine and Portugall, at the Ilands of the Azores. Anno Dom. 1582 Bazan, Álvaro de, marquês de Santa Cruz, 1526-1588.
[24] p.
By Thomas Purfoote, and are to be sould at his shop ouer-against Saint Sepulchers Church without Newgate, Imprinted at London : [1583?]
Suggested publication date from STC. At end: this relation was sent by the Lord Marquis de Sainta-cruse vnto his Maiestie .. . Signatures: A-C⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
